item.title: 0-RTT Connection Resumption
item.description: 0-RTT Connection ResumptionZero round trip time resumption (0-RTT) improves performance for clients who have previously connected to your website. This feature particularly benefits end users who visit your application regularly or who use mobile networks. For more details on what 0-RTT is, how it works, and potential limitations, refer to our blog External link icon Open external link . ​​ Availability Free Pro Business Enterprise Availability Yes Yes Yes Yes ​​ Enable 0-RTT Connection Resumption By default, 0-RTT Connection Resumption is not enabled on your Cloudflare application.
